pack.name: ASCO GI 2026
pack.tagline: Pharma & biotech leaders presenting at the 2026 ASCO GI Cancers Symposium
pack.description: 64 pharma and biotech companies with 174 sponsored abstracts at ASCO GI 2026 (January 23-25, San Francisco). Includes actual presenting authors from the abstracts — the researchers and clinical leaders driving GI oncology programs.
pack.targetBuyer: Oncology-focused platforms, clinical trial software, medical writing services, RWE vendors targeting GI oncology decision-makers
